com.ibm.wdp.toolkit.util

Class FileUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.wdp.toolkit.util.FileUtil

  • public class FileUtil
extends Object
    class for assigning values to the localMeta, remoteMeta, tmpDirectory variables, reading file and deleting directory

      • getMetaFileNames

      • readFile

        public static String readFile(String path,
                              Charset encoding)
                       throws IOException
        Reads the contents of the files
        Parameters:
        path - The file to be read
        encoding - Encoding to be used
        Returns:
        Returns the contents of the file as a string
        Throws:
        IOException - Throws IOException if there is an error in reading the file or if the file is not found

      • deleteDirectory

        public static void deleteDirectory(File file)
                            throws IOException
        Deletes the directory if the directory has no files. If the directory has files it deletes all the files in the directory and then the directory gets delted
        Parameters:
        file - The file to be deleted
        Throws:
        IOException - Throws IOException if there isn't any directory
